items.title: White House tells agencies to draft mass firing plans ahead of potential shutdown
items.description: The White House is telling agencies to prepare large-scale firings of federal workers if the government shuts down next week.

items.title: Judge rules feds can't require states to cooperate on immigration to get disaster money

items.title: Justice Department trying to indict former FBI Director Comey by next week
items.description: Federal prosecutors are trying to indict former FBI Director James B. Comey before the statute of limitations runs out next week for perjury charges.

items.title: Judge rules Trump broke law by firing inspectors general, but can't restore them to office
